main event: A pulsating, round object emitting a brilliant white light was observed by several witnesses, including an Intelligence Officer, in Carlsbad, New Mexico on March 15, 1962.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for about 10-15 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.
The object's brilliant white light cast a glow over the surrounding area.
The Air Force Systems Command Foreign Technology Division requested additional information from the witness to assist in the evaluation of the sighting.
The report mentions that the observer directed questions about the sighting to the Walker Company, suggesting the observer was not seeking publicity.
The report includes detailed weather and wind conditions at various altitudes at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: A pulsating, round object emitting a brilliant white light
witnesses: Several witnesses, including an Intelligence Officer
